edu.cmu.sphinx.decoder.scorer

Interface AcousticScorer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Configurable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleAcousticScorer, ThreadedAcousticScorer

    public interface AcousticScorer
extends Configurable
    Provides a mechanism for scoring a set of HMM states

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void allocate()
      Allocates resources for this scorer
      Data calculateScores(java.util.List<? extends Scoreable> scorableList)
      Scores the given set of states over previously stored acoustic data if any or a new one
      Data calculateScoresAndStoreData(java.util.List<? extends Scoreable> scorableList)
      Scores the given set of states over previously acoustic data from frontend and stores latter in the queue
      void deallocate()
      Deallocates resources for this scorer
      void startRecognition()
      starts the scorer
      void stopRecognition()
      stops the scorer

      • calculateScores

        Data calculateScores(java.util.List<? extends Scoreable> scorableList)
        Scores the given set of states over previously stored acoustic data if any or a new one
        Parameters:
        scorableList - a list containing Scoreable objects to be scored
        Returns:
        the best scoring scoreable, or null if there are no more frames to score

      • calculateScoresAndStoreData

        Data calculateScoresAndStoreData(java.util.List<? extends Scoreable> scorableList)
        Scores the given set of states over previously acoustic data from frontend and stores latter in the queue
        Parameters:
        scorableList - a list containing Scoreable objects to be scored
        Returns:
        the best scoring scoreable, or null if there are no more frames to score
